Name: UCL3
Title: Poor Air Quality across the whole UK-Ireland-France area
Description: A 1km daily map of the UKIF area derived from the MODIS-MAIC product is shown for 5 years (1.1.18-31.12.22). Step-through each day to see how the PM2.5 changes over time and how much of the pollution originates in major urban areas or areas with large-scale industrial activitoe such as the Thames Estuary and the Rotterdam industrial areas.
